Message:
I know not if losing
her voice caused Mother
to become a witch,

or if becoming a witch
resulted in her losing her voice.

all while everyone’s screams of
terror intensified throughout
the crumbling theater.

I could only watch in horror
as this disaster unfolded
before me...

My beautiful world
was destroyed instantly—
shattered to pieces by
the witches’ song.

No more... Enough...
I don’t want to see
anything anymore...

The theater was devastated
even further when the
Knights of Longinus
surged inside.

They closed in on the witches,
executing them all at once.

As the floor was
stained red with blood,

I looked up at the stage in
one last act of desperation.
